====== DESCRIPTION ======

Flesh + Bone III is our third in a series of juried exhibitions that examines contemporary figurative art, juried by figurative painter, Scott Hutchison. This is an all media exhibition that invites artists to submit work for consideration that includes the human figure as its subject. This opportunity is open to all artists, national and international, over 18 years of age.

Awards: A Best in Show award will be given in the amount of $100
Application: bit.ly/FleshBoneIII

Deadline for Entries: May 20th
Notification: June 7th
Exhibition Dates: July 5th - 28th
Opening: July 12th, 6-9pm


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Application can be found here: bit.ly/FleshBoneIII
